description: Hua Chunying, a spokeswoman for China’s Foreign Ministry, said on Thursday that other countries had not done enough to decrease tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
title: China Defends Its North Korea Policy
title_page: China Defends Its North Korea Policy - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Hua Chunying, a spokeswoman for China’s Foreign Ministry, said on Thursday that other countries had not done enough to decrease tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
